org.xwalk.core

Annotation Type JavascriptInterface


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface JavascriptInterface
    Marks a method as being able to be exposed to JavaScript. This is used for safety purposes so that only explicitly marked methods get exposed instead of every method in a class. See the explanation for XWalkView.addJavascriptInterface(Object, String) about the usage.
